general_advisory: For better agricultural benefits, use OUAT KALINGA products. IMD Weather forecast and Agro-meteorological advisory of Odisha location are available on Meghdoot mobile app. Contact the Met. Centre for further information.

advisory: Panicle Initiation to flowering initiation - Brown plant hopper infestation: Spray Pymetrozine 50% WG at appropriate dosage. Bacterial Leaf Blight infestation: Spray Copper Hydroxide or Plantomycin along with Copper Oxy Chloride.
Apply appropriate fertilizers based on the type of rice cultivar.
Square initiation to boll formation stage.
Reproductive stage - Stem Rot disease management: Seed treatment or fungicide spray.
Vegetative stage - Leaf webber, sucking pests, and wilt management: Spray appropriate pesticides at recommended dosages.
Vegetative to Fruiting - Epilachna Beetle management: Neem-based pesticide or chemical sprays as needed.
Vegetative to Fruiting - Mealy bug management: Neem-based pesticide or insecticidal soap.
Maintain ideal dissolved oxygen levels in the pond. Use aerator or circulate pond water if necessary.
